text: David Wayne Spade (born July 22, 1964) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, writer, and television personality, known for his roles as Dennis Finch in Just Shoot Me!, Marcus Higgins in Grown Ups, and Russell Dunbar in Rules of Engagement. He is also known as the voice of Kuzco in The Emperor's New Groove and Kronk's New Groove. Spade was born on August 22, 1964 in Birmingham, Michigan. Spade moved to Scottsdale, Arizona at age four. He studied at Arizona State University. Spade has a daughter named Harper. The mother is Jillian Grace, a Playboy Playmate. ==Movies== Year Title Role Notes 1987 Police Academy 4: Citizens on Patrol Kyle 1992 Light Sleeper Theological Cokehead Indiana Jones Captain Samuel
